thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Holy Stone Healthcare sets subscription record date on March 27 for new shares issuance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Holy Stone Healthcare sets subscription record date on March 27 for new shares issuance

organizations.name: reuters) - holy stone healthcare co ltd

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Holy Stone Healthcare Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to issue 7 million new shares of the company to raise fund for working capital supplement
* Subscription record date is March 27
* Last date before book closure is March 22
* Book closure period is from March 23 to March 27
* Payment period is from April 3 to April 13
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/u75B39
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
